    class Buffers
extends ValueChangeProducer
implements Component
    The set of all known buffers.

      • create

        Buffer create(java.lang.String name,
              BufferConfiguration config)
        This method creates a new buffer. If a buffer with the given name exists, this buffer is released before the new buffer is created.
        Parameters:
        name - the buffer name
        config - the buffer configuration
        Returns:
        the buffer or null, if the new buffer configuration is null

      • create

        Buffer create(java.lang.String name,
              BufferConfiguration config,
              boolean isHardware)
        This method creates a new buffer. If a buffer with the given name exists, this buffer is released before the new buffer is created.
        Parameters:
        name - the buffer name
        config - the buffer configuration
        isHardware - is this a hardwarebuffer?
        Returns:
        the buffer or null, if the new buffer configuration is null

      • remove

        Buffer remove(java.lang.String name)
        This method removes a buffer. If no buffer with the given name exists, this method has no effect.
        Parameters:
        name - the buffer name
        Returns:
        the removed buffer

      • bufferByName

        Buffer bufferByName(java.lang.String name)
        This method returns a wellknown buffer.
        Parameters:
        name - the buffer name
        Returns:
        the buffer with the given name or null, if no buffer with this name exists

      • queryBuffersByName

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> queryBuffersByName(java.lang.String name)
        This method looks for available buffers.
        Parameters:
        name - a regular expression specifying the buffer name, which should be scanned. A simple match satisfy the search condition, the regular expression must not match the whole feature description.
        Returns:
        a collection of all the buffer names matching this query

      • queryBuffersByMetainfo

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> queryBuffersByMetainfo(java.lang.String topic,
                                                       java.lang.String feature)
        This method looks for available buffers.
        Parameters:
        topic - a regular expression specifying the buffer topics, which should be scanned for the wanted features. These are keys of the buffer meta information. A simple match satisfy the search condition, the regular expression must not match the whole topic name.
        feature - a regular expression specifying the buffer features, which should be scanned. A simple match satisfy the search condition, the regular expression must not match the whole feature description.
        Returns:
        a collection of all the names of those buffers, which matches this query
